type.description: Defines the type of button to display. Currently must be set to web_url.

label.description: The text that will be displayed to the user on each button. Max string length of 36 characters.

url.description: A valid http or https target URL of the button.

tco_url.description: The t.co version of the URL will be returned in a POST response and on the read path (GET requests) only.
